duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide mobility assistance to patients based on AM-PAC Mobility Score and JH-HLM Goal Score.
Collaborate with healthcare team to communicate patient progress and ensure medical stability for patient activity.
Assist in safe patient handling, lifting, turning, and positioning of patients.
Daily mobilization of appropriate patients using necessary equipment.
Assist therapy team during sessions when warranted.
Maintain a clean and safe environment for patient mobilization.
Accept non-routine work assignments and maintain Safe Patient Handling Equipment on the nursing unit.

education_certification.credential: High School Graduate/GED, CNA certification or enrolled in licensed nurse program, or completed fundamentals of nursing course, or experience in therapy field or care partner role or mobility specialist training.
